profileAlternative.name: Jordan Rhodes
profileAlternative.headline: Full Stack JavaScript Developer at Exzeo
profileAlternative.summary: Currently on a mission to become a software architect.

aboutAlternative.text: Currently on a mission to become a software architect.

positions.title: Full Stack Javascript Developer
positions.description: Focusing on large scale Enterprise application development.

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description:
Focusing on Javascript, specifically Node, and React one an extremely large scale, long running, greenfield project. In company that historically used Java and .Net (c#) solutions, I helped establish best practices and development/build infrastructure for future projects that would rely on JavaScript heavily.

Having been exposed to such a large project - both in terms of team size/ speed of development and scope of the applications - so early in my career, I gained a deep understanding of JavaScript the language and the JavaScript ecosystem.

I quickly became a leader on the project, pushing standards, best practices, knowledge sharing and collaboration, and process improvement.
…
see more

positions.title: Development Technician
positions.description:
Worked in a full stack Javascript stack. This included Node.js, React, MongoDB, and the frontend build pipeline in a traditionally .Net software consulting firm. I was given ownership of several projects during my time here.

Provided solutions for clients in a wide range of industries. I was responsible for developing cross platform applications, with a focus on reusable code across web, native, and server side applications.

Worked in an agile workflow including backlog refinement, story grooming / discovery, sprint planning and estimation, sprint retrospectives, and daily stand-ups.
…
see more

positions.title: Intern Full Stack Web Developer
positions.description: Feature development on a Ruby on Rails web application / api. As an Intern at an early stage startup, I was given many responsibilities including quality assurance, documenting the API for mobile app consumption, test automation using rspec, UI/UX design and development, business strategy, and new feature development on the web app.

positions.title: Senior Marketing Consultant
positions.description:
Prospect Smarter provides software and services to automate, measure and maximize marketing and sales effectiveness. We’re a unique fusion of software provider and marketing services firm.

Our team is made up of savvy technologists and fresh creative thinkers who are lead by experienced executives with a proven record of software, marketing and sales success.

Since 1998, we've had the good fortune of working with some of the world's largest and most successful marketing and sales organizations along with hundreds of equally impressive smaller companies.

Today our software and services support thousands of marketing and sales initiatives for over 400 organizations. Our services are used across a broad range of companies and we specialize in business to business initiatives within the software/technology, manufacturing and industrial markets.

Specialties
direct marketing, software development, lead generation, pay-per-performance marketing
…
see more

positions.title: Web Expert
positions.description: Helped small businesses create, maintain, and monetize their web sites and web presence.

given.text:
Jordan is the kind of professional I love working with. He's bright, talented, eager, and passionate about software. His knowledge and expertise with JavaScript makes him invaluable. He's comfortable teaching as well as learning from others. I'm extremely grateful to have benefited from his instruction. Jordan is a fantastic developer, leader, and technologist. If you have the opportunity to work with, for, or hire Jordan then do it now!
…
See more

received.text:
Being constantly bombarded by recruiters, working with Jeff was a breath of fresh air. From initial contact, to following up, and following through, Jeff was professional and personable.

He took his time and worked with me to find a great opportunity that was the right fit. When it was time to make a decision, he left me to decided what was best for me. 

I now consider Jeff a friend, and will be working with him again in the future.

I worked for Taylor as an intern, looking to break into the software development world. Taylor quickly became more than an employer, mentoring me in various aspects of being a professional. He made himself available for everything from touching up my resume, to giving me insight on how to run a business, and everywhere in between. My career has been on a steep upward trajectory, and I attribute that directly to my time working with Taylor.
